name: Way of the Samurai Jam
description:
A true samurai shall only fight their opponents on equal grounds. Can you survive the onslaught of enemies without breaking the Samurai Code?

UPDATE 1: You can now actually defeat your enemies and rack up your kill count. You can also currently slay the innocent pink bystander balls with no consequences, which goes a bit off message so please ignore that.

UPDATE 2: You can now Boost forwards by pressing enter! Boosting has a cooldown, but if you slay an enemy using your boost, it recharges inmediately, allowing you to chain boosts! Aditionally, bystanders work properly now, so be mindful of the pink balls!

UPDATE 3: Added a sneaky new enemy... Watch out, some of those bystanders may not be as innocent as they seem... Also added a small difference between game over screens and some extra tutorial text to explain how Boosting works
